channel.itunes:subtitle: Short Story Play Podcasts
channel.itunes:author: Michael McGee
channel.itunes:summary: Short Story Audiodramas... Mixing humor and drama, The Theater Of The Midnight Sun is an all new series of full-cast audio plays that offers original audiodrama podcasts of adventure, mystery, science fiction, fantasy, comedy, thrillers, and literary fiction for lovers of radio theater, literature, and NPR programs like "This American Life", "Selected Shorts", and "Prairie Home Companion", as well as BBC radio plays like "Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy". Essentially a podcast stage for new short story play productions, tales appearing on The Theater Of The Midnight Sun range from 1 to 6 half-hour episodes in length. The show is hosted by Michael McGee.
